Russel09, I couldn't disagree more. This was a horribly boring episode that simply echoes themes that numerous previous episodes laid out.

SPOILER ALERT!!!!

Ok I get it, people are scared, hungry and feral. nothing happened in this episode. Woodbury is still in shambles with no advancement towards retaliation. Rick's group is still falling apart with the new baby.  Glen and Maggie aren't talking? that makes no sense. Tyrese and his group were talking about joining up the whole episode just to be told to "get out".  oh and a whole new thing happened...rick saw lori...oh wait that happened already with the whole phone thing.

just a tired episode of light build up for the next installment.  the only real thing of note is merle and daryl running off together.  and that is lame for the flow of the show.
there is no password on this torrent. do not comment on a torrent saying something bad about it unless you are SURE it is the torrent you downloaded, this goes for ANYONE.
